questions.text: Hey, I'm a sleepy driver. I didn't sleep well last night, but i drink a lot of coffee today? so I know I can drive for another hour ... easy, but, you know what? This time i didn't make it. Wanna know why?
questions.title: Intro teaser

finalAnswers.text: I think we all know what happened. Most traffic accidents happen dew to drawthiness and coffee won't help. Our insurance company kindly asks you to rest properly before you drive. Please stay safe!
finalAnswers.title: AI Respose if Interest

finalAnswers.text: I couldn't tell you even if i want it to, because of a drawthiness I've got insure in major accident
finalAnswers.title: AI Respose No Interest

finalAnswers.text: Ok, our insurance company asked me to say it again
finalAnswers.title: AI Respose No Interest

finalAnswers.text: It feels like no once there, if you feel sleepy wake up now and get some rest
finalAnswers.title: AI Response if Silence

questions.text: I didn't get that. Let's try one more time. Say 'yes' or 'no'.
questions.title: AI Response if Not understood

finalAnswers.text: It make me sad, but i still don't understand what you saying. Next time take a deep breath and respond slowly.
finalAnswers.title: AI Response if Not understood again
